reviewtext: I should have taken measurements of my camera before bying this item.  I havea small sony cybershot. I was able to clean the lens with this, but only withthe tip at an extreme angle wiping with the edge of the little round disk.  Itdid the trick, but this device is not for pocket size cameras. It's for largerlenses only.  The brush, however, is very handy.  I keep it in the pouch withmy camera when traveling
summary: Sima Lens Pen, not exactly what I expected
